data.title: Whistler's Gold: The Secret at Nizhoni Toh by Winterton, Wayne: Near Fine Hardcover (2005) 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9781599267524 - Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Xlibris Corporation - 2005 - Condition: Near Fine - Very Good - Double signed by the author. Signed, inscribed, and dated on second free endpaper; signed again on title page. Grey cloth boards with gilt lettering on spine. Boards are in near fine condition with a bar code sticker affixed to back board. Small stain on top edge of text block. Pictorial dust jacket with black lettering on spine. Jacket is wrapped in mylar. Some creasing and shelf wear to edges, mostly to head of spine. Tight binding and clean interior. Laid in are a postcard and business card both promoting the book. This romantic mystery novel follows a family of three as they try to prevent the theft of a 400-year-old treasure on the Navajo Reservation. - Whistler's Gold: The Secret at Nizhoni Toh

About this Item

Double signed by the author. Signed, inscribed, and dated on second free endpaper; signed again on title page. Grey cloth boards with gilt lettering on spine. Boards are in near fine condition with a bar code sticker affixed to back board. Small stain on top edge of text block. Pictorial dust jacket with black lettering on spine. Jacket is wrapped in mylar. Some creasing and shelf wear to edges, mostly to head of spine. Tight binding and clean interior. Laid in are a postcard and business card both promoting the book. This romantic mystery novel follows a family of three as they try to prevent the theft of a 400-year-old treasure on the Navajo Reservation. Seller Inventory # 0021820
